mcqquestion: Which of the following is a cognitive characteristic of obsessive compulsive disorder (OCD):

mcqoptions: Can only be used in group situations
Allows the client some control over the therapy

mcqquestion: Which definition of abnormality does this statement correspond to ‘behaviour which does not fit the rules of expected behaviour’:
Which of the following is an example of Jahoda’s criteria for ideal mental health:
Which statement best describes the deviation from ideal mental health definition of abnormality:
mcqoptions: Not following the standards set by society
Behaviour that interferes with everyday life
Not being able to resist stress
